hadiths.text: Sa'id b. Zaid b. 'Amr b. Nufail reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:Truffles are a kind of 'Manna' which Allah the Glorious and Exalted, sent down upon the people of Israil, and its juice is a medicine for the eyes

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ الْكَمْأَةِ وَمُدَاوَاةِ الْعَيْنِ بِهَا
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of truffles, and treating the eyes with them
